ygData.subject: Netted armour
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey people! Well, I was lookin for some netted armour but to no avail. Heard those Froglocks in Guk have them? I ve only 15 plat in the bank. My hard earned
ygData.messageBody:
Hey people!

Well, I was lookin' for some netted armour but to no avail. Heard those Froglocks in Guk have them? I've only 15 plat in the bank. My hard earned savings playing in odd hours during the exams. <sob sob>

I managed to get a netted tunic from Mikrin for only 5 gold. Man That guys is an angel, extremely friendly too. He too is a monk of the 6th circle <lvl 6 back then>.

How much money do you guys make anyways? I can bank in only max 1 plat per hour but that affects my EXP gain very much considering the meagre hours I play...

Wilson
<The Semi-Bruce Lee Fan>
<The Ever Newbie>
